definition.achievementDescription: Gives the player all exposed copper recipes.
definition.triggerxml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="item_in_inventory" x="15" y="14"><value name="amount_l"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="amount_h"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">64</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">Blocks.EXPOSED_COPPER</field></block></value><next><block type="advancement_trigger" deletable="false"></block></next></block></xml>
